overviewContent.description: +7 years of experience. Mechatronics Engineer and Fullstack Developer from Mexico. I love turning problems into elegant solutions.

experience.description: Development of web pages using Astro. Working on an integration using ERPNext. Looking for AZ-204: Azure Developer certification.
US based client on Marketing business. Reduced team velocity metrics. Promoted to coordinate the dev team. Helping team to transition from Waterfall to Agile.
US based client on Real Estate business. Development and maintenance of an internal web platform. Work within the SCRUM framework. Certified in AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals.
Development of web sites and applications using mainly Angular, Google Cloud Functions (Node.js) and Firebase. UI/UX creation and improvement.

Work in +20 projects using different technologies. Development of web applications and pages. Database modeling. Presentation of progress and projects with clients. Creation of Rest APIs for integrations with existing software.

content.title: Kinil Kab
content.description: Landing page of a bee honey business. Made in Astro. 100% Performance in Google Lighthouse.

content.title: Minesweeper Clone
content.description: Game developed in React + Vite. Aiming to demonstrate the use of hooks like useEffect and useState.

aboutContent.title: About me
descriptions: My name is Freddy. I turned my love for math and problem solving into software development. I have a strong background working with several JavaScript frameworks.

I'm always eager to explore new technologies and methodologies. As a matter of fact, I'm currently learning a modern framework for building fast and optimized websites (Astro) and I want to see how far I can go with it.
I am also an enthusiastic person about learning languages. Along my way I have learned English, French, Italian and I'm currently learning Dutch.
